Dragged to some backwater summer camp for "half-bloods" by a young woman after helping her fight off some weird meta thug, where everyone took Ancient Greek myths far too seriously. Don't get him wrong, he loved those stories; he basically grew up on them, but there was no way that this was all real.   Like, come on... A half-horse activities director? Magical strawberry fields? It was all too much, and that was coming from the guy from a city overrun with metas and who lived right next door to the place with an alien as its hero. Though Bruce didn't know or even trust the guy (?), Superman made far more sense than these demigods.  Bruce fights a minotaur with Diana and gets dragged to Camp Half-Blood, where he then finds out he’s a demigod, makes a very attractive friend, and finds out the sun has been stolen.
